steps.stepDescription: Verify element By.xpath("(//div[@class=\"zlQd20 _1eDlvI\"])[3]") with condition: checkProductImages
Verify element By.xpath("//span[text()=\"Men\"]") with condition: checkMenApparel
Verify element By.xpath("//span[text()=\"Home & Furniture\"]") with condition: checkFurniture
Verify element By.xpath("//a[text()=\"Offer Zone\"]") with condition: checkOfferZone
Verify element By.xpath("//a[text()=\"Grocery\"]") with condition: checkGrocerySection
Verify element By.xpath("//input[@type=\"text\"]") with condition: checkLogin
